job.title: SaaS Data Enhancement
job.description:
Hi! We run https://bulletbrief.com/, a tool that connects to your Google Cal and then is supposed to send background & info on the person you have meetings with.

Our data is mediocre, even though we've connected it with ProxyCurl (Nubela) + GPT.

Looking for an expert to come in an solve the problems to make the platform better.

When applying, give us 2 specific things you'd be implementing w/ timeline needed:

Backend:
    * Framework: .NET 8
    * Database: MS SQL (using Entity Framework for database interaction)
    * Logging: NLog
    * Architecture: CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) using Mediatr

Frontend:
    * Framework: Angular 17
    * UI Component Library: PrimeNG
    * Forms Handling: Reactive Forms

Hosting:
    * Cloud Service: AWS
    * Virtualization: Hosting using a virtual machine

External Services/Platforms:
        * Connected Services:
        * Loops
        * ProxyCurl (Nubela)
        * ChatGPT
        * Google API (Authentication, People API, Calendar API)

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented freelancer to assist with a SaaS Data Enhancement project. The project duration is expected to be less than 1 month. The main skill required for this job is Angular.

As our ideal candidate, we would like you to submit a proposal outlining how you can help us with this project. Specifically, we would like to know about your experience and expertise in SaaS Data Enhancement, as well as any relevant skills or qualifications you possess.

Additionally, please provide links to any past completed projects that are similar in nature to this one. This will help us assess your capabilities and determine if you are the right fit for our project.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project further.
